text: Dame Monica Jessie Dacon, n√©e Sheen (born 4 June 1934) is a Saint Vincent and the Grenadines schoolteacher, educator and politician. She is the widow of parliamentarian St. Clair Dacon.OAS profile, oas.org; accessed 1 September 2014. She became acting Governor-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines in 2002. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Governors-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:Companions of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Living people Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Monica Dacon
